data.name: Creatures of Energy
data.detailed_description:
In this game you grow your army of creatures to destroy the enemy.
Creatures are groups of connected pieces.
A move in this game is to copy a creature you control and paste it in a different position.
The copy has to overlap the creature. So the size and shape determines the moves you can make.



You gain control over creatures when this pattern, called a core, is part of that creature:


You can play vs the AI or other players online.
You can change the board size to play on a huge board and make more complex shapes.
There are also puzzles where the enemy does not move but you have a limited number of moves to win.

There are also puzzles where the enemy does not move but you have a limited number of moves to win.
data.short_description: Grow creatures to destroy the enemy. A turn-based strategy game where your moves make your army. Creatures are groups of connected pieces on the board.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7, windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 112 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 142 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 142 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
